name: Blocky Climbers
description:
A 1-touch blocky adventure! Blocky Climbers is a fun and addictive relay style skill game. Just hop up, collect diamonds and don't fall!

> Tap left to jump 1 space
> Tap right to jump 2 spaces
> Avoid the holes
> Move fast for time extensions
> Collect diamonds and unlock new blocks
> ..and most importantly- BEAT your friends

Stay Connected

Support: support@yololabs.com
